snippet: Jordan’s ambassador to Libya, Fawaz al-Itan, was kidnapped on Tuesday by gunmen who demanded that an Islamist militant be released from a Jordanian jail in exchange for the diplomat’s freedom.
abstract: Masked gunmen kidnap Jordan’s ambassador to Libya, Fawaz al-Itan; demand that an Islamist militant be released from a Jordanian jail in exchange for Itan’s freedom.
lead_paragraph: Jordan’s ambassador to Libya, Fawaz al-Itan, was kidnapped on Tuesday by gunmen who demanded that an Islamist militant be released from a Jordanian jail in exchange for the diplomat’s freedom.

headline.main: Libya: Jordan’s Envoy Is Held Hostage
headline.print_headline: Libya: Jordan’s Envoy Is Held Hostage
